e: 例⃝「`人參~、`貂皮~、`烏拉草~`是~`東北~`的~`三寶~」。

Deutsch: (english: the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism - namely, the Buddha `佛~, the Dharma `法~ (his teaching), and the Sangha `僧~ (his monastic order))
English: the Three Precious Treasures of Buddhism, namely: the Buddha `佛~, the Dharma `法~ (his teaching), and the Sangha `僧~ (his monastic order)
